entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High 8.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of freezing drizzle changing to drizzle this morning and ending this afternoon then clearing. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
